common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Use this api to split an order into multiple packages. Orders that include installation services cannot be split by quantity.

error_list.name: error_permission
error_list.description: Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: {msg}.

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: System error. Please try again later.

error_list.name: order.order_cannot_split
error_list.description: You donâ€™t have the permission to split order.

error_list.name: order.order_has_been_split
error_list.description: This order has already been split.

error_list.name: order.order_split_duplicate_item
error_list.description: Cannot split order with duplicate items.

error_list.name: order.order_split_failed
error_list.description: Split order failed, please try again.

error_list.name: order.order_split_failed
error_list.description: Cannot split order paid by Credit Card Installment payment method or SPayLater payment method with instalment plan greater then 1x.

error_list.name: order.order_split_get_package_info_failed
error_list.description: Split order succeed, but failed to get the new package info.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The size of package list is over limit.

error_list.name: order.order_split_item_not_exist
error_list.description: Cannot split order with invalid items.

error_list.name: order.order_split_package_missing_item
error_list.description: Cannot split order with missing items.

error_list.name: order.order_split_wrong_item_position
error_list.description: Cannot split order with items in one bundle-deal or add-on deal into different packages.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"name":"order_sn","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"2012300NQJVTYN","type":"string","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for an order.","key":"dNFYHCt"},{"name":"package_list","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"","type":"object[]","children":[{"name":"item_list","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"","type":"object[]","children":[{"name":"item_id","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"3600140554","type":"int64","description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

","key":"EjBxcjG"},{"name":"model_id","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"10000605797","type":"int64","description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for a model of an item. For single item without variation, you can set model_id as 0.

","key":"DCsxaye"},{"name":"order_item_id","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"int","description":"The identify of order item. For items in one same bundle deal promotion, the order_item_id should share the same id, such as 1,2. For items not in bundle deal promotion, the order_item_id should be the same as item_id.","key":"XNFedRP"},{"name":"promotion_group_id","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"int","description":"

The identify of product promotion.It's required for add on deal and bundle deal items.
For items in one same add on deal or bundle deal promotion, the promotion_group_id should share the same id. For items not in add on deal or bundle deal promotion, the promotion_group_id should be 0. And the data is from promotion_group_id of v2,order.get_order_detail.

","key":"QCnJSkh"},{"description":"

The number of identical items put in the package, the quantity sum of the same item from each parcel must be the full item quantity of the whole order.


This field is only eligible for the shop whitelisted to the unit-level split in SG/TH/TW/MY markets. 

","name":"model_quantity","sample":"2","type":"int32","required":"False","key":"RwEsSAG"}],"description":"

The list of items under the same package.

","key":"wGTAdit"}],"description":"

The list of packages that you want to split. 


Note: 

- Orders that include installation services cannot be split by quantity.

- When splitting the order, must contain all items in the order in one request.

- You can split the order into 30 parcels at most in TW and 5 parcels at most in other regions.

","key":"HfMjYda"}],"response_params":[{"sample":"common.error_auth","type":"string","name":"error","description":"Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.","key":"YEjtGaX"},{"sample":"Invalid access_token.","type":"string","name":"message","description":"Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.","key":"EKaFHS"},{"sample":"","type":"object","description":"Detail informations you are querying.","name":"response","children":[{"sample":"2012300NQJVTYN","type":"string","name":"order_sn","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for an order.","key":"rSnHSKf"},{"sample":"","type":"object[]","description":"The list of package under this order you have split.","name":"package_list","children":[{"sample":"2521728636547073446","type":"string","name":"package_number","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.","key":"zdcksNe"},{"sample":"","type":"object[]","description":"The list of items under this package.","name":"item_list","children":[{"sample":"3600140567","type":"int64","name":"item_id","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for an item.","key":"pTCkWQM"},{"sample":"2000502199","type":"int64","name":"model_id","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a model.","key":"pmkeXcc"},{"sample":"","type":"int","name":"order_item_id","description":"

The identify of order item. For items in one same bundle deal promotion, the order_item_id should share the same id, such as 1,2. For items not in bundle deal promotion, the order_item_id should be the same as item_id.

","key":"xZYakrK"},{"sample":"","type":"int","name":"promotion_group_id","description":"

The identify of product promotion. For items in one same add on deal promotion, the promotion_group_id should share the same id. For items not in add on deal promotion, the promotion_group_id should be 0. And the data is from group_id of shopee.orders.GetOrderDetails.

","key":"eytrnXn"},{"description":"

The number of identical items put in the package.

","name":"model_quantity","sample":"","type":"int","required":null,"key":"TZYebCM"}],"key":"xNZwCZE"}],"key":"sQYNPPm"}],"key":"bQmBWNQ"},{"sample":"02a3a65749ea47d2b4bba11e1ea30056","type":"string","name":"request_id","description":"The identifier of the API request for error tracking.","key":"ZeTptKm"}]}

update_log_list.content: add new request field "model_quantity" for the eligible sellers to the unit-level split.
